Hero.title:
Transform how 
you sell
Hero.subtitle: Register your company and start selling your events today

TMT.title: Trade Master Transactions
TMT.description: Trade Master Transactions is a transactional platform that facilitates B2P and P2P exchanges in an environment designed to protect the personal data of customers and users.
TMT.description2: With our corporate service, you will get an Administrative Panel that will allow you to: Create events, products, or services aligned with your strategy. Build landing pages without the need for code, with intuitive tools and integrated sales channels (e-commerce, payment gateways, and digital billing). Create and manage Ticket Offices and/or Stores for your sales channels. Quote and manage advertising campaigns from the platform: select networks, manage budgets, and obtain performance indicators and reports. Define and assign roles for your team (salespeople, exchange staff, access control, etc.). View revenue and reports in real time, with digital billing and corresponding bank reconciliation.

step1.title: Register your company
step1.description: Contact one of our Representatives to register your company with us

step2.title: Service Selection
step2.description: Negotiation of rates, service fees, implementation, and training

step3.title: Commercialization
step3.description: Start marketing your products or services with us

SectionApps.heading: Three apps in a single platform
SectionApps.subheading: Whether you’re creating events, buying tickets, or managing, our integrated platform has everything you need.

item1.title: Your selling app
item1.description: Manage access control and the delivery of your products or services simply and securely, even without an internet connection.
item1.modal: With our app, control access to your events and the delivery of your products or services, with registration and tracking of entries and exits at all times.

item2.title: Manage your channels
item2.description: Manage your sales force and the distribution of your tickets and products across multiple channels in a simple and organized way.
item2.modal: Assign salespeople or ticket sellers and define how your tickets, services, or products are distributed on each channel. Organize all your products and services in a clear and user-friendly way, assigning a ticket office or store to each business partner. Configure different administrative roles for employees who operate the application, managing permissions and responsibilities.

item3.title: All your tickets in one place
item3.description: It is the solution for users to manage and administer their tickets and orders from a single platform. Centralize your users' experience in a unified interface to purchase, share, and view tickets, products, and services.
item3.modal: Customers can access the details of their tickets, orders, products, and services from the app, quickly and easily. Tickets can be transferred between users (P2P), making it easy to transfer them to anyone interested in purchasing them. It acts as a direct notification channel between artists, producers, or brands and their customers, keeping them informed in real time.

SectionServices.heading: How to hire our services?
SectionServices.subheading: We guide you at every step so you can start selling your tickets, services or events with a powerful, secure and growth-ready platform.

items.title: Business registration
items.desc: Complete the form with your legal info, bank account and required documents.

items.title: Custom setup
items.desc: Upload events, products or services—capacity, pricing, maps, design, etc. Our team guides you step by step.

items.title: Integration & sales
items.desc: Publish your landing page, manage ticket offices and start selling with full control from your Dashboard.

items.title: Advertising
items.desc: Promote your events and products on our platform and social networks to maximize reach.

items.title: Support & analytics
items.desc: Access sales reports, analytics and tailored support to optimize your business.

items.title: e-Invoicing
items.desc: Automatically generate electronic invoices for each sale, compliant with tax regulations.

Login.subtitle: Boost your commercial relationships, optimize client follow-ups and grow your sales.
